resources.string: "We are looking to make finances a thing for everyone to be able to deal with in a manner that does not feel overwhelming. Our philosohpy is that your information is that, yours. We don't want anything that would make you feel uncomfortable. All we are looking to do is help."
When it comes to saving money, would you prefer a flat rate of money or a percentage of your income? (Monthly)
How much would you like to save?
Tap here to update liquid account values
In this layout we will make it so the user can update liquid accounts
in this layout we are going to make it so they can add money to bank or in cash value
this layout has to allow users to select what account and the expenses they are adding to the account
